Game.Name: Sanrio Carnival (Japan)
Game.plot: Sanrio Carnival is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Scitron & Art and published by Character Soft,which was released in Japan in 1990.Cheat: 5th Puzzle ModeAt the main menu, select the second option, then hold A and B on Player 2's controller. During this time, press A on Player 1's controller to unlock a fifth puzzle mode.
Game.Notes: Sanrio Carnival is a Puzzle game, developed by Scitron & Art and published by Character Soft, which was released in Japan in 1990.
